title: Expense-Manager
description: Expense Manager built with React.js and Firebase, utilizing Bootstrap for streamlined UI and CRUD functionality.

title: Cookie Manager
description: A React.js application managing cookies with built-in todo-list functionalities for adding and deleting tasks.

title: Student Management
description: A Firebase-powered student management application enabling seamless CRUD operations for efficient academic tracking.

title: Customer Management
description: A React-based customer management system with dynamic product selection from an API, allowing for seamless CRUD operations.

title: Invoice Generator
description: A React-based invoice generator allowing users to add multiple items with name, rate, quantity, and automatically calculating the total amount.

title: Amazone Clone
description: An Amazon clone crafted with HTML and CSS, meticulously replicating the user interface and responsive layout of the original platform for seamless browsing across different screen sizes.

title: Whatsapp Clone
description: WhatsApp clone created with React.js and Firebase, providing a seamless messaging experience with real-time updates and robust user authentication.

title: Age Calculator
description: Age calculator tool computes precise age, including years, months, days, and time, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: To Do List
description: Todo list app crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring task addition and deletion functionalities to streamline task management.
